product_name: Feedback Sports Sprint Bike Repair Stand
long_description: Feedback Sports Sprint Bike repair stand lets you service your steed without having to clamp the frame tubing, and it folds up small for easy transport. Constructed out of lightweight aluminum, which withstands regular use and won't rust. Stable tripod base lets you work comfortably on a variety of surfaces, including dirt, gravel or sloping pavement. 360deg rotation and fully adjustable fork and bottom bracket position make it easy to work on your bike. Working height can be adjusted quickly and easily from 30 - 48 in. Single Point quick-release mount secures your bike by either the font or rear dropouts; accommodates most current road and mountain bike dropouts, including 15mm thru axles. Please note: 20mm thru axle adapters work with this repair stand but are not included. Storage and transport is made simple thanks to the compact folded size of 30 in. x 7.5 in. x 5 in. Please note: the Feedback Sports Sprint Bike repair stand has a load capacity of up to 85 lbs.
short_description: Feedback Sports Sprint Bike repair stand lets you service your steed without having to clamp the frame tubing, and it folds up small for easy transport.
